AStr.Run: Use this domain for general words referring to the physical universe. Some languages may not have a single word for the universe and may have to use a phrase such as 'rain, soil, and things of the sky' or 'sky, land, and water' or a descriptive phrase such as 'everything you can see' or 'everything that exists'.

Question.AUni: (1) What words refer to everything we can see?
(1) ما هي الكلمات التي تدل على كل شيء يمكن أن نراه؟

ExampleWords.AUni: universe, creation, cosmos, heaven and earth, macrocosm, everything that exists

AStr.Run: In the beginning God created <the heavens and the earth>.
Use this domain for words related to the sky.

Question.AUni: (1) What words are used to refer to the sky?
(1) ماهي الكلمات التي تستعمل لتدل على السماء ؟

ExampleWords.AUni: sky, firmament, canopy, vault

Question.AUni: (2) What words refer to the air around the earth?
(2) ما هي الكلمات التي تدل على الهواء المحيط بالأرض؟

ExampleWords.AUni: air, atmosphere, airspace, stratosphere, ozone layer

Question.AUni: (3) What words are used to refer to the place or area beyond the sky?
(3) ما هي الكلمات التي تدل على المكان أو المنطقة فوق السماء؟

ExampleWords.AUni: heaven, space, outer space, ether, void, solar system

Question.AUni: (4) What words describe something in the sky or something that happens in the sky?
(4) ما هي الكلمات التي تصف شيئا في السم2.uاء أو شيئا يحصل في السماء؟

ExampleWords.AUni: aerial, heavenly, atmospheric, stratospheric, celestial,

Question.AUni: (5) What words describe the appearance of the sky?
(5) ما هي الكلمات التي تصف مظهر السماء؟

ExampleWords.AUni: blue, clear, black (night), cloudy, cloud filled, brilliant, dark, night sky, foreboding, stormy, dark, star studded

Question.AUni: (6) What words refer to the edge of the sky where it meets the ground?
(6) ما هي الكلمات التي تدل على المنطقة التي تتقاطع فيها السماء و الأرض؟

ExampleWords.AUni: horizon, skyline

Question.AUni: (7) What words refer to something in the sky?
(7) ما هي الكلمات التي تدل على شيء في السماء؟

ExampleWords.AUni: heavenly body, celestial body, luminary

Question.AUni: (8) What words refer to the lights that appear in the northern (or southern) sky?
(8) ما هي الكلمات التي تدل على الأضواء التي تظهر في السماء الشمالية (أو الجنوبية)

ExampleWords.AUni: aurora borealis, northern lights

Question.AUni: (9) What words refer to something being in the sky?
(9) ما هي الكلمات التي تدل على أنه يوجد شيء في السماء؟

ExampleWords.AUni: aloft, up in the sky, up in the air,

AStr.Run: Use this domain for words related to the sun. The sun does three basic things. It moves, it gives light, and it gives heat. These three actions are involved in the meanings of most of the words in this domain. Since the sun moves below the horizon, many words refer to it setting or rising. Since the sun is above the clouds, many words refer to it moving behind the clouds and the clouds blocking its light. The sun's light and heat also produce secondary effects. The sun causes plants to grow, and it causes damage to things.

Question.AUni: (1) What words refer to the sun?
(1) ماهي الكلمات التي تدل على الشمس؟

ExampleWords.AUni: sun, solar, sol, daystar, our star

Question.AUni: (2) What words refer to how the sun moves?
(2) ما هي الكلمات التي تدل على كيفية تحرك الشمس؟

ExampleWords.AUni: rise, set, cross the sky, come up, go down, sink

Question.AUni: (3) What words refer to the time when the sun rises?
(3) ما هي الكلمات التي تدل على الوقت الذي تطلع فيه الشمس؟

ExampleWords.AUni: dawn, sunrise, sunup, daybreak, cockcrow,

AStr.Run: We got up before <dawn>, in order to get an early start.

Question.AUni: (4) What words refer to the time when the sun is at its highest point?
(4) ما هي الكلمات التي تدل على الوقت الذي تكون فيه الشمس في أعلى مستوى في السماء؟

ExampleWords.AUni: noon, zenith,

Question.AUni: (5) What words refer to the time when the sun sets?
(5) ما هي الكلمات التي تدل على وقت غروب الشمس؟

ExampleWords.AUni: sunset, dusk, sundown, twilight, eventide,

Question.AUni: (6) What words refer to when the sun is shining?
(6) ما هي الكلمات التي تدل على وقت إشعاع الشمس؟

ExampleWords.AUni: shine, sunny, bright, give light, be sunshiny, daytime,

Question.AUni: (7) What words refer to the sun shining through the clouds?
(7) ما هي الكلمات التي تدل على بروز الشمس من وراء السحب؟

ExampleWords.AUni: come out, break through (the clouds), go behind (a cloud)

Question.AUni: (8) What words describe where the sun is shining?
(8) ما هي الكلمات التي تصف المكان الذي تُشعّ فيه الشمس؟

ExampleWords.AUni: sunlit, be (out) in the sun, lit by the sun, shine on, be in the sunlight, sunny (spot)

Question.AUni: (9) What words describe when or where the sun doesn't shine?
(9) ما هي الكلمات التي تصف الزمان أو المكان الذي لا تشع فيه الشمس؟

ExampleWords.AUni: shade, eclipse of the sun, sunless, shady, shadow, eclipse (v),

Question.AUni: (10) What words refer to the light of the sun?
(10) ماهي الكلمات التي تدل على ضوء الشمس؟

ExampleWords.AUni: sunlight, ray, sunshine, beam, light, sunbeam, radiance, glow, sparkle, glisten, glare

Question.AUni: (11) What words describe the brightness of the sun?
(11) ماهي الكلمات التي تصف سطوع الشمس؟

ExampleWords.AUni: bright, intense, brilliant, blinding, glaring, glistening, luminous, dim

Question.AUni: (12) What refer to the sun heating things?
(12) ماهي الكلمات التي تدل على تدفئة الشمس للأشياء ؟

ExampleWords.AUni: warm, heat, dry

Question.AUni: (13) What else does the sun do?
(13) ما هي الأشياء الأخرى التي تفعلها الشمس ؟

ExampleWords.AUni: looks down on

Question.AUni: (14) What words describe the damage done by sunlight?
(14) ما هي الكلمات التي تصف الضرر الذي يحدثه ضوء الشمس؟

ExampleWords.AUni: sunburn, sunstroke, suntan, tan, heatstroke, heat prostration, sun damage, fading from the sun, bleached by the sun

Question.AUni: (15) What do people use to protect themselves from the sun?
(15) ما الذي يستعمله الناس ليحموا أنفسهم من الشمس؟

ExampleWords.AUni: sunglasses, shade tree, suntan lotion, awning, sun umbrella, parasol, sunbonnet, hat, visor

Question.AUni: (16) What words are used of telling time by the sun?
(16) ماهي الكلمات التي تستعمل حتى نسأل عن التوقيت من خلال حركة الشمس؟

ExampleWords.AUni: sundial, angle of the sun, sun-clock, shoot the sun, position of the sun,

Question.AUni: (17) What words refer to using the power of the sun?
(17) ماهي الكلمات التي تدل على استعمال طاقة الشمس؟

ExampleWords.AUni: solar energy, solar power, solar panel

AStr.Run: Use this domain for words related to the moon. In your culture people may believe things about the moon. For instance in European culture people used to believe that the moon caused people to become crazy. So in English we have words like "moon-struck" and "lunatic." You should include such words in this domain.

Question.AUni: (1) What words refer to the moon?
(1) ما هي الكلمات التي تدل على القمر؟

ExampleWords.AUni: moon, lunar, satellite

Question.AUni: (2) What words refer to how the moon moves?
(2) ما هي الكلمات التي تدل على كيفية تحرك القمر؟

ExampleWords.AUni: rise, set, sink

Question.AUni: (3) What words refer to the time when the moon rises?
(3) ما هي الكلمات التي تدل على توقيت طلوع القمر؟

ExampleWords.AUni: moonrise, rising of the moon,

Question.AUni: (4) What words refer to the time when the moon sets?
(4) ما هي الكلمات التي تدل على توقيت غروب القمر؟

ExampleWords.AUni: moonset, setting of the moon,

Question.AUni: (5) What words refer to when the moon is shining?
(5) ما هي الكلمات التي تدل على توقيت إشعاع القمر؟

ExampleWords.AUni: moon is shining, by the light of the moon, moon is/comes out,

Question.AUni: (6) What words describe where the moon is shining?
(6) ماهي الكلمات التي تصف مكان إشعاع القمر؟

ExampleWords.AUni: moonlit, be in the moonlight, lit by the moon, shine on,

Question.AUni: (7) What words describe when or where the moon doesn't shine?
(7) ما هي الكلمات التي تدل على الوقت و المكان الذي لا تشع فيه الشمس؟

ExampleWords.AUni: moonless night, eclipse of the moon, eclipse (v),

Question.AUni: (8) What words refer to the light of the moon?
(8) ما هي الكلمات التي تدل على ضوء القمر؟

ExampleWords.AUni: moonlight, moonbeam, moonshine,

Question.AUni: (9) What words describe the brightness of the moon?
(9) ما هي الكلمات التي تصف سطوع القمر؟

ExampleWords.AUni: bright, pale,

Question.AUni: (10) What words describe the appearance of the moon?
(10) ما هي الكلمات التي تصف مظهر القمر؟

ExampleWords.AUni: man in the moon, harvest moon

Question.AUni: (11) What words refer to the spots on the moon?
(11) ما هي الكلمات التي تدل على أرجاء القمر؟

ExampleWords.AUni: lunar sea, crater,

Question.AUni: (12) What words refer to the phases of the moon?
(12) ما هي الكلمات التي تدل على مراحل دوران القمر؟

ExampleWords.AUni: phase, new moon, full moon, half moon, quarter moon, crescent, sliver, moon is waxing (getting bigger), moon is waning (getting smaller), wax and wane

Question.AUni: (13) What words refer to the time it takes for the moon to go through its phases?
(13) ما هي الكلمات التي تدل على الوقت الزمني اللازم حتى يمرّ القمر بكلّ أطواره؟

ExampleWords.AUni: (lunar) month

AStr.Run: Use this domain for words related to the stars and other heavenly bodies.

(1) ما هي الكلمات التي تدل على النجم؟

ExampleWords.AUni: star, starry, stellar

Question.AUni: (2) What words describe the sky when the stars are shining?
(2) ماهي الكلمات التي تستعمل لتصف السماء عندما تكون فيها النجوم مشعة؟

ExampleWords.AUni: starlit (sky), (sky is) ablaze with stars, starry (sky), star studded (sky), stars are shining

Question.AUni: (3) What words are used for where the stars are shining?
(3) ما هي الكلمات التي تستعمل لتدل على المكان الذي تشع فيها النجوم؟

ExampleWords.AUni: starlit, lit by the stars

Question.AUni: (4) What words are used for when or where the stars don't shine?
(4) ما هي الكلمات التي تستعمل لتدل على الزمان و المكان الذي لا تشع فيه النجوم؟

ExampleWords.AUni: starless (sky, night)

Question.AUni: (5) What words refer to the light of the stars?
(5) ما هي الكلمات التي تدل على ضوء النجوم؟

ExampleWords.AUni: starlight

Question.AUni: (6) What words describe the brightness of the stars?
(6) ماهي الكلمات التي تصف سطوع النجوم؟

ExampleWords.AUni: bright, brilliant, dim, luminous

Question.AUni: (7) What words describe the appearance of the stars?
(7) ما هي الكلمات التي تصف مظهر النجوم؟

(8) ما هي الكلمات التي تدل على دراسة علوم الفلك؟

ExampleWords.AUni: astronomy, astronomer, astrology, astrologer, stargazer, magi

Question.AUni: (9) What is a group of stars called?
(9) ما هو اسم مجموعة من النجوم؟

ExampleWords.AUni: constellation, galaxy, nebula

AStr.Run: Use this domain for words related to planets (large objects that circle the sun, looking like bright wandering stars in the sky), comets (objects that circle the sun, looking like a star with a tail), meteors (small objects that come from space and burn up when they hit the earth's atmosphere, causing a streak of light across the sky), and asteroids (small objects that circle the sun), planetary moons (large objects that circle the planets). Some cultures do not study the stars and will have few or no words in this domain. Others cultures that study the stars will have many words. There are only five planets that people can see in the sky--Mercury, Venus, Mars, Jupiter, and Saturn. The others are only known from the scientific study of astronomy.

Question.AUni: (1) What words refer to a planet?
(1) ما هي الكلمات التي تدل على كوكب؟

ExampleWords.AUni: planet, planetary, wandering star

Question.AUni: (2) What are the names of the planets?
(2) ما هي أسماء الكواكب؟

ExampleWords.AUni: Mercury, Venus (Morning Star, Evening Star), Earth, Mars, Jupiter, Saturn, Uranus, Neptune, Pluto

Question.AUni: (3) What words refer to how the planets move?
(3) ما هي الكلمات التي تدل على كيفية تحرك الكواكب؟

ExampleWords.AUni: revolve (around the sun), orbit,

Question.AUni: (4) What words refer to the sun and planets?
(4) ما هي الكلمات التي تدل على الشمس و الكواكب؟

ExampleWords.AUni: solar system

Question.AUni: (5) What words refer to comets?
(5) ما هي الكلمات التي تدل على المذنبات؟

ExampleWords.AUni: comet, tail, head

Question.AUni: (6) What do comets do?
(6) ماذا تفعل المذنبات؟

ExampleWords.AUni: appear, point, fade

Question.AUni: (7) What words refer to meteors?
(7) ما هي الكلمات التي تدل على النيازك؟

ExampleWords.AUni: meteor, shooting star, falling star, meteor trail, meteor shower

Question.AUni: (8) What do meteors do?
(8) ما الذي تفعله النيازك؟

ExampleWords.AUni: flash across the sky, blaze a trail across the sky, strike the earth, make a crater, burn up

Question.AUni: (9) What words are used for when a meteor hits the earth?
(9) ماهي الكلمات التي تستعمل عندما يصطدم النيزك بالأرض؟

ExampleWords.AUni: meteorite, meteor crater

Question.AUni: (10) What is a small planet called?
(10) ماذا نسمي كوكبا صغيرا؟

ExampleWords.AUni: asteroid, moon

AStr.Run: Use this domain for words related to the air around us, including the air we breathe and the atmosphere around the earth.

Question.AUni: (1) What words refer to the air we breathe?
(1) ما هي الكلمة التي تدل على الهواء الذي نتنفسه؟

ExampleWords.AUni: air

Question.AUni: (2) What words refer to how much water is in the air?
(2) ما هي الكلمات التي تدل على كمية الماء في الهواء؟

ExampleWords.AUni: humid, humidity, damp, dry, sticky, muggy

Question.AUni: (3) What words describe good air (such as when the air in a room is clean or doesn't smell bad)?
(3) ما هي الكلمات التي تصف هواء جيدا( مثال:عندما يكون الهواء نظيفا في غرفة ولا تكون رائحته كريهة) ؟

ExampleWords.AUni: fresh air, airy, well ventilated

Question.AUni: (4) What words describe bad air (such as when the air in a room is dirty, hot, smells bad, or too many people are breathing)?
(4) ما هي الكلمات التي تصف الهواء عندما يكون وسخا(مثال:عندما يكون الهواء وسخا في غرفة أو ساخنا أو نتنا أو عندما يكون هناك عدد أكثر من اللازم من الناس الذين يتنفسونه)

ExampleWords.AUni: stuffy, airless, stifling, polluted, air pollution, smog

AStr.Run: Use this domain for words related to causing air to move.

(1) ما هي الكلمات التي تدل على جعل الهواء يتحرك؟

ExampleWords.AUni: blow, fan, exhaust, expel, explode

Question.AUni: (2) What words refer to letting air blow through something?
(2) ما هي الكلمات التي تدل على ترك الهواء يتسرب داخل جسم ما؟

ExampleWords.AUni: air out, ventilate

Question.AUni: (3) What words refer to putting air into something (such as a tire or balloon)?
(3) ماهي الكلمات التي تدل على إدخال الهواء داخل جسم ما( مثل إطار عجلة أو بالون)

ExampleWords.AUni: blow up, inflate, pump up, pneumatic

Question.AUni: (4) What words refer to keeping air out of something?
(4) ماهي الكلمات التي تدل على إبقاء الهواء خارج جسم ما؟

ExampleWords.AUni: seal, airtight

Question.AUni: (5) What words refer to how much air is in something?
(5) ما هي الكلمات التي تدل على كمية الهواء وسط جسم ما؟

ExampleWords.AUni: air pressure, vacuum

Question.AUni: (6) What words refer to using the wind to winnow grain?
(6) ما هي الكلمات التي تدل على استعمال الهواء لغربلة الحبوب؟

ExampleWords.AUni: winnow

Question.AUni: (7) What tools and machines are used to create or use the wind?
(7) ما هي الوسائل و الآلات التي تستعمل لتكوين و استعمال الهواء؟

ExampleWords.AUni: fan, air pump, bellows, ventilator, wind tunnel, propeller, air pipe, airshaft, vent, chimney, exhaust, funnel, windmill, sail, valve

AStr.Run: Use this domain for words related to the weather.

(2) ما هي الكلمات التي تصف الطقس عندما يكون جيدا؟

(3) ما هي الكلمات التي تصف الطقس عندما يكون في تحسن؟

ExampleWords.AUni: clear, clear up, sun comes out,

Question.AUni: (4) What words describe the weather when it is bad?
(4) ما هي الكلمات التي تصف الطقس عندما يكون سيئا؟

ExampleWords.AUni: bad, terrible, foul, inclement, rough, dirty sky, severe

Question.AUni: (5) What words describe the weather when it is getting worse?
(5) ما هي الكلمات التي تصف الطقس عندما يكون متقلبا نحو الأسوأ ؟

(6) ما هي الكلمات التي تصف الطقس عندما يتغير؟

ExampleWords.AUni: (cold/warm/storm) front

Question.AUni: (8) What words are used to describe any kind of weather?

(9) ما هي الكلمات التي تصف درجات الحرارة؟

ExampleWords.AUni: temperature, hot, warm, heat, cold, chilly, crisp, mild, unseasonably warm/cold, scorching, heat wave, cold spell, cold snap, frigid, freezing, be a chill in the air,

Question.AUni: (10) What words describe the weather when there is a lot of water in the air?

ExampleWords.AUni: humid, humidity, damp, sultry

Question.AUni: (11) What words refer to the type of weather a place normally has?

ExampleWords.AUni: climate, dry/wet/cold/hot climate, tropical, temperate

Question.AUni: (12) What words describe something that has been exposed to the weather for a long time?

ExampleWords.AUni: weather-beaten, weathered

Question.AUni: (13) What words refer to studying the weather?

ExampleWords.AUni: meteorology, meteorologist, weatherman

Question.AUni: (14) What instruments are used to study the weather?

ExampleWords.AUni: thermometer, barometer, weathervane

Question.AUni: (15) What words refer to a report about the weather?
(15) ما هي الكلمات التي تدل على تقرير حول حالة الطقس؟

ExampleWords.AUni: weather forecast, weather report, the weather, the outlook

AStr.Run: Use this domain for words related to the wind. Some words refer to when the wind begins and ends. The wind changes in speed, so some words refer to how fast the wind is moving. Try to rank these on a scale from very slow to very fast. These words may also be distinguished by what the wind does, since a fast wind does more things. These words may also be distinguished by how long the wind blows. Some words refer to the speed of the wind becoming faster or slower. Some words distinguish a steady wind from a wind in which the speed keeps changing. Some words refer to when the speed of the wind becomes faster for a short time. A steady wind moves in a particular direction, so there are words that include the direction of the wind. The direction of the wind may refer to the points of the compass, a neighboring geographical feature or area, or the direction in which the speaker is moving. Some words refer to a wind that moves in a small circle, making a pillar of dust or a funnel-shaped cloud. Some words refer to what the wind does, such as when it moves or damages something. People can feel the wind, so some words refer to how it feels. The wind makes noise, so there are words that refer to the sound of the wind. In some cultures there is a relation between the wind and spirits, so some words may refer to the activity of the spirits in the wind, or that the wind brings disease.

Question.AUni: (1) What general words refer to the wind?
(1) ما هي الكلمات التي تدل علي الريح؟

ExampleWords.AUni: wind, windy, wind current

Question.AUni: (2) What words describe a wind that only lasts a short time?
(2) ما هي الكلمات التي تصف ريحا تدوم لفترة قصيرة؟

ExampleWords.AUni: breath of air, puff of wind, gust, blast, flurry

Question.AUni: (3) What words describe a steady wind?
(3) ما هي الكلمات التي تصف رياحا مستقرة؟

ExampleWords.AUni: steady wind, trade wind, monsoon winds

Question.AUni: (4) What words describe a wind that comes and goes?
(4) ما هي الكلمات التي تصف رياحا تهب من فترة إلى أخرى؟

ExampleWords.AUni: intermittent, gusty, blustery

AStr.Run: Use this domain for words related to earthquakes. In some languages earthquakes are thought of as moving somewhere. In Amele (PNG) they say "mim nen" which means 'the earthquake came down (from above)'. In Northern Embera an earthquake is a "house-shaking". They say "a house-shaking went."

Question.AUni: (1) What words refer to earthquakes?
(1) ما هي الكلمات التي تدل على الزلازل؟

ExampleWords.AUni: earthquake, quake, tremor, temblor, shock, seismic, upheaval

Question.AUni: (2) What do earthquakes do?
(2) ماذا تفعل الزلازل؟

ExampleWords.AUni: rock (house, ground), shake (house, ground), crack (ground), knock down (things), cause (buildings) to collapse, ground splits, earth shifts

Question.AUni: (3) Where do earthquakes occur?
(3) ين تحدث الزلازل؟

ExampleWords.AUni: earthquake fault, fault line, epicenter, fissure

Question.AUni: (4) What words refer to a large wave caused by an earthquake?
(4) ما هي الكلمات التي تدل على موجة عالية يحدثها زلزال؟

ExampleWords.AUni: tidal wave, tsunami,

AStr.Run: Use this domain for general words for all plants. Use a book of pictures to identify plant names and the scientific name. Languages divide plants into various domains that are not always comparable from language to language. Criterial features may be characteristics (trees and bushes are distinguished by size and number of trunks) and use (grass and weeds are distinguished by their desirability). A common distinction is between trees and non-trees, with trees described as being big, woody, and having a life expectancy of several years, while non-trees are small, non-woody, and have a life expectancy of typically not more than one year (Heine, Bernd and Karsten Legere. 1995. Swahili plants. Rudiger Koppe Verlag: Koln.). Agricultural societies will divide plants into wild and cultivated. However most plants for which there are names have some use. Therefore it does not seem helpful to divide plant names into domains for useful and non-useful plants. Since only parts of plants are eaten, edible parts of plants are listed under the domain 'Food'. Some languages may have more domains than are used in this list, others may have fewer. The classification system used here does not agree entirely with the system used by botanists. For instance botanists do not classify all the tree species together. The palm trees belong to the class Monocotyledoneae and are classified with lilies, bananas, and orchids. Apple and cherry trees belong to the class Dicotyledoneae and are classified in the rose family along with roses and blackberries. The acacia tree also belongs to the class Dicotyledoneae and is classified in the pulse family along with lupines and beans. However most folk taxonomies bring all the trees together. The scientific classification system for plants and animals is taken from: Carruth, Gorton, ed. 1989. The Volume Library, Vols. 1 and 2. The Southwestern Company: Nashville.

AStr.Run: Use this domain for trees--flowering plants with roots, stems, and leaves, which are large and have a wooden trunk (Phylum Spermatophyta, Subdivision Angiospermae). Also include the evergreen trees (Phylum Spermatophyta, Subdivision Gymnospermae). Evergreen trees do not have flowers, but have cone like fruits (pinecones) that contain seeds. Their leaves are shaped like needles and are retained for over a year.

AStr.Run: Use this domain for small plants that have roots, stems, flowers, and seeds, but do not have a wooden trunk (Phylum Spermatophyta, Subdivision Angiospermae). Also include the seedless plants, such as ferns (phylum Pteridophyta, class Felicineae), horsetails (phylum Pteridophyta, class Equisetineae), and club mosses (phylum Pteridophyta, class Lycopodineae). Plants of the Pteridophyta phylum have no flowers or seeds. Ferns have large, divided, feather-like leaves, or fronds. Club mosses are small (rarely over one meter) evergreen plants with simple leaves resembling pine or hemlock needles. Sometimes they grow upright, but often trail on the ground, where they propagate by means of runners. Horsetails send up tall, vertical, jointed stalks with branches covered with scale like leaves.

AStr.Run: Use this domain for mosses (phylum Bryophyta, class Musci), liverworts (phylum Bryophyta, class Hepaticae), fungi (phylum Thallophyta, subdivision Fungi), algae (phylum Thallophyta, subdivision Algae), and lichens. These plants do not have true roots, stems, or leaves. The mosses are small, green, flowerless plants that grow in moist environments and look like velvety or feathery growths carpeting the ground, tree trunks, and rocks. The liverworts are similar to the mosses with a flat and branching growth pattern. The algae possess green chlorophyll. They vary from one-celled organisms, which sometimes live in colonies such as pond scum, to complex organisms such as seaweed. The fungi do not possess chlorophyll and feed off of other organic material. Lichens consist of a fungus and an algae growing together. They commonly grow on trunks of trees and rocks. Some are flat and leafy, and some are moss like.

AStr.Run: Use this domain for words describing types of animals. Use a book of pictures to identify each species and its scientific name. This section is organized according to the scientific, biological classification of animals. It may not correspond to the local classification of animals (folk taxonomy), which are often based on how people relate to animals (tame/wild, edible/work). Use this domain for words referring to large classes of animals that do not correspond to the scientific classification. For instance this would be the place for a word like 'flying animal', which includes birds, bats, and flying insects.

Question.AUni: (1) What words refer to types of animals?
(1) ما هي الكلمات التي تدل على أنواع الحيوانات؟

ExampleWords.AUni: phylum, class, order, family, genus, species, chordate, vertebrate, invertebrate, crustacean, rodent, insect, arthropod, mollusk, echidna, protozoa, protozoan, protozoon, amebic, amoeba, bacteriophage, cold-blooded, warm-blooded, multicellular, single-celled, unicellular, microorganism, germ, virus, viral, purebred, hybrid, quadruped, biped, two-footed, four-footed, diurnal, nocturnal, beast, brute, vermin, varmint, albino

Question.AUni: (6) What words refer to roundworms (phylum Nematoda)?
(6) ماهي الكلمات التي تدل على الديدان الاسطوانية (فيلوم نيماتودا)

ExampleWords.AUni: roundworm, hookworm, pinworm

Question.AUni: (7) What words refer to rotifers (phylum Rotifera)?
(7) ما هي الكلمات التي تدل على الدوارات (فيلوم روتيفارا)

ExampleWords.AUni: rotifer

Question.AUni: (8) What words refer to mollusks (phylum Mollusca)?
(8) ما هي الكلمات التي تدل على الرخويات (فيلوم مولوسكا)

ExampleWords.AUni: mollusk, snail, slug, abalone, oyster, scallop, mussel, clam, nautilus, cuttlefish, octopus, squid, conch

Question.AUni: (9) What words refer to segmented worms (phylum Annelida)?
(9) ما هي الكلمات التي تدل على الديدان المقسمة (فيلوم أناليدا)

ExampleWords.AUni: segmented worm, earthworm, leech

Question.AUni: (10) What words refer to walking worms (phylum Onychophora)?
(10) ما هي الكلمات التي تدل على الديدان المخملية (فيلوم أونكوفرا)

ExampleWords.AUni: velvet worm, walking worm

Question.AUni: (11) What words refer to crustaceans (phylum Arthropoda, class Crustacea)?
(11) ما هي الكلمات التي تدل على القشريات (فيلوم آرثروبودا، من مجموعة كروستاسييا)

ExampleWords.AUni: crustacean, shrimp, barnacle, pill bug, lobster, crab, crawfish, crayfish

Question.AUni: (12) What words refer to centipedes--animals with a body with many segments and two legs on each segment (phylum Arthropoda, class Chilopoda)?
(12) ما هي الكلمات التي تدل على الحريشة أي حيوان بجسم يحتوي على العديد من الأجزاء وكذلك على رجلين لكل جزء(فيلوم أرثروبودا، من مجموعة تشيلوبدا)

ExampleWords.AUni: centipede

Question.AUni: (13) What words refer to millipedes--animals with a body with many segments and four legs on each segment (phylum Arthropoda, class Diplopoda)?

(13) ما هي الكلمات التي تدل على الدودة الألفية التي يتركب جسمها من عدة أجزاء وكذلك أربعة أرجل لكل جزء ( فيلوم ارثروبدا، من مجموعة ديبلوبودا) \qun (14) ماهي الكلمات التي تدل على سرطان حدوة الحصان(فيلوم آرثروبودا ، من مجموعة ميروزتوماتا)

ExampleWords.AUni: millipede

Question.AUni: (14) What words refer to horseshoe crabs (phylum Arthropoda, class Merostomata)?
(14) ما هي الكلمات التي تدل على ذراعيات الأرجل –حيوانات ذات قوقعتين و ذراعين (فيلوم براكيبودا)

ExampleWords.AUni: horseshoe crab

Question.AUni: (15) What words refer to brachiopods--animals with two shells and two arms (phylum Brachiopoda)?
(15) ما هي الكلمات التي تدل على الحيوانات ذات البشرة الشائكة(فيلوم اكينودارماتا)

ExampleWords.AUni: brachiopod, lampshell

Question.AUni: (16) What words refer to animals with spiny skins (phylum Echinodermata)?
(16) ما هي الكلمات التي تدل على هلبيات الفك (فيلوم أكينودرماتا)

ExampleWords.AUni: echinoderm, sea cucumber, sea urchin, sand dollar, sea star, starfish, brittle star

Question.AUni: (17) What words refer to arrow worms (phylum Chaetognatha)?

ExampleWords.AUni: arrow worm

AStr.Run: Use this domain for the parts of animals, especially those of mammals.

Question.AUni: (1) What general words refer to the parts of an animal?
(1) ما هي الكلمات العامة التي تدل على اجزاء حيوان ما؟

ExampleWords.AUni: animal body parts

Question.AUni: (2) What are the parts of the head?
(2) ما هي أجزاء الرأس؟

ExampleWords.AUni: head, ear, eye, nose, muzzle, maw, snout, trunk (of an elephant), proboscis, mouth, tooth, fang , tusk, tongue, neck, horn, antler, dewlap,

Question.AUni: (3) What are the parts of the torso?
(3) ما هي أجزاء جذع الإنسان؟

ExampleWords.AUni: chest, back, belly, rump, croup, tail, switch, udder, flank, brisket, teat, hindquarters,

Question.AUni: (4) What are the parts of the legs?
(4) ما هي أجزاء الرجل؟

ExampleWords.AUni: foreleg, forefoot, forepaw, forelimb, hind leg, hind limb, hoof, paw, claw, hock, fetlock, haunch, pastern, shank, stifle,

Question.AUni: (5) What are the parts of the skin and hair?
(5) ما هي أجزاء البشرة و الشعر؟

ExampleWords.AUni: fur, wool, fleece, forelock, mane, hide, skin, meat, pelt, whisker, sheepskin, goatskin, leather,

Question.AUni: (6) What are the internal parts of an animal?
(6) ما هي الأجزاء الداخلية في جسد الحيوان؟

ExampleWords.AUni: skull, second stomach (for cows, goats, sheep), spinal cord, lung, heart, small intestine, large intestine, liver, gall bladder, pancreas, kidney

Question.AUni: (7) What are the parts of sea mammals?
(7) ما هي أجزاء اجسام ثدييات البحر؟

ExampleWords.AUni: whale flukes, flipper, blubber, baleen, blow hole,

AStr.Run: Use this domain for the parts of a bird, but not general parts that belong to all animals.

(1) ما هي أجزاء اجسام طير ما؟

AStr.Run: Use this domain for the parts of a reptile.

Question.AUni: (1) What are the parts of reptiles?
(1) ما هي اجزاء أجسام الزواحف؟

ExampleWords.AUni: scale, snakeskin, fang, rattle (of rattlesnake), coil, egg tooth,

Question.AUni: (2) What are the parts of a turtle?
(2) ما هي اجزاء اجسام السلحفات؟

ExampleWords.AUni: shell

Question.AUni: (3) What words refer to a snake's poison?
(3) ما هي الكلمات التي تدل على سمّ ثعبان؟

ExampleWords.AUni: venom, venomous, poison, poisonous

AStr.Run: Use this domain for the parts of a fish.

Question.AUni: (1) What are the parts of fish?
(1) ما هي أجزاء جسم السمكة؟

ExampleWords.AUni: scale, scaly, fin, tail fin, dorsal fin, gill, guts, slime, slimy, fishy smell

AStr.Run: Use this domain for the parts of an insect.

Question.AUni: (1) What are the parts of insects?
(1) ما هي أجزاء جسم الحشرة؟

ExampleWords.AUni: head, abdomen, thorax, carapace, exoskeleton, wing, horn, stinger, sting, segment, antenna, feeler, forewing, proboscis, compound eye, spinneret,

AStr.Run: Use this domain for the parts of small animals.

Question.AUni: (1) What are the parts of shellfish?
(1) ما هي أجزاء جسم المحّار؟

ExampleWords.AUni: shell, mother of pearl, mantle, foot, swimmeret,

Question.AUni: (2) What are the parts of worms?
(2) ما هي أجزاء أجسام الديدان؟

ExampleWords.AUni: segment

Question.AUni: (3) What are the parts of an octopus or squid?
(3) ما هي أجزاء جسم الأخطبوط أو الحبّار؟

ExampleWords.AUni: tentacle, sucker, appendage,

AStr.Run: Use this domain for words related to the life cycle of an animal.

Question.AUni: (1) What words refer to an animal giving birth?
(1) ما هي الكلمات التي تدل على ولادة حيوان؟

ExampleWords.AUni: give birth, embryo, multiply, propagate, reproduce, calve, calving, drop, kid, lambing, lay, spawn, spawning grounds, whelp

Question.AUni: (2) What words refer to a young animal?
(2) ما هي الكلمات التي تدل على حيوان صغير؟

ExampleWords.AUni: young, puppy, cub, foal, kid, kitten, lamb, litter, chick, brood, fledgling, larva, roe

Question.AUni: (3) What words refer to the sexual behavior of animals?
(3) ما هي الكلمات التي تدل على التصرّف الجنسي للحيوانات؟

ExampleWords.AUni: mate, harem, breed

Question.AUni: (4) What words refer to the life cycle of insects?
(4) ما هي الكلمات التي تدل على دورة الحياة عند الحشرات؟

ExampleWords.AUni: cocoon, chrysalis, pupa, pupal stage, maggot, grub, larva, larval, caterpillar, nymph

Question.AUni: (5) What words refer to animals such as snakes, birds, and insects shedding their skin?
(5) ما هي الكلمات التي تدل على تغيير حيوانات مثل الثعابين والطيور و الحشرات لجلدتها؟

ExampleWords.AUni: shed (skin), molt (feathers)

Question.AUni: (6) What words refer to animals growing fur, feathers, or new skin?
(6) ما هي الكلمات التي تدل على نمو الفرْوْ أو الريش أو البشرة جديدة عند حيوان؟

ExampleWords.AUni: molt, shed, down, fledge,

AStr.Run: Use this domain for words related to eggs.

Question.AUni: (1) What words refer to an egg?
(1) ما هي الكلمات التي تدل على البيضة؟

ExampleWords.AUni: egg

Question.AUni: (2) What types of eggs are there?
(2) ما هي أنواع البيض الموجودة؟

ExampleWords.AUni: bird egg, reptile egg, insect egg

Question.AUni: (3) What are the parts of an egg?
(3) ما هي أجزاء البيضة؟

ExampleWords.AUni: shell, eggshell, yoke, white, membrane, embryo

Question.AUni: (4) What is a baby bird called?
(4) ماذا نسمي فرخ الطير؟

ExampleWords.AUni: chick, baby bird, hatchling

Question.AUni: (5) What do birds do to eggs?
(5) ما الذي تفعله الطيور للبيض؟

ExampleWords.AUni: lay, sit on, incubate, roust, turn, fertilize

Question.AUni: (6) Where do birds lay their eggs?
(6) ين تضع الطيور بيضها؟

ExampleWords.AUni: nest

Question.AUni: (7) What is a group of eggs called?
(7) ماذا نسمي مجموعة من البيض؟

ExampleWords.AUni: clutch

Question.AUni: (8) How do baby birds get out of their egg?
(8) يف تخرج فراخ الطيور من البيض؟

ExampleWords.AUni: hatch, peck its way out of the egg

Question.AUni: (9) What words are used for opening an egg?
(9) ما هي الكلمات التي تدل على انفتاح البيضة؟

ExampleWords.AUni: crack, break, smash

Question.AUni: (10) What words are used to describe a bad egg?
(10) ما هي الكلمات المستعملة لوصف بيضة غير جيدة؟

ExampleWords.AUni: rotten, cracked, broken

AStr.Run: Use this domain for actions of animals.

Question.AUni: (1) What words refer to the ability of an animal to do something without learning it?
(1) ما هي الكلمات التي تدل على قدرة حيوان ما على أن يفعل شيئا من دون أن يتعلمه؟

ExampleWords.AUni: instinct, instinctive

Question.AUni: (2) What words refer to animals hunting?
(2) ما هي الكلمات التي تدل على قيام الحيوانات بالصّيد؟

ExampleWords.AUni: hunt, stalk, prey

Question.AUni: (3) What words refer to animals sleeping during the winter?
(3) ما هي الكلمات التي تدل على نوم الحيوانات أثناء فترة الشتاء؟

ExampleWords.AUni: hibernate

Question.AUni: (4) What do birds do?
(4) ما الذي تفعله الطيور؟

ExampleWords.AUni: roost, (hen) gathers chicks

Question.AUni: (5) What do snakes do?
(5) ما الذي تفعله الثعابين؟

ExampleWords.AUni: strike, coil, crush (prey), sun (themselves), venom,

Question.AUni: (6) What do fish do?
(6) ما الذي تفعله الأسماك؟

ExampleWords.AUni: spawn, lay eggs

Question.AUni: (7) What do insects do?
(7) ما الذي تفعله الحشرات؟

ExampleWords.AUni: sting, collect nectar

AStr.Run: Use this domain for ways in which animals move. Only include words specific for the movement of animals. For the movement of people use the domains under Movement. It is necessary to think through how each type of animal moves, especially the important ones.

Question.AUni: (1) How do mammals move?
(1) يف تتحرّك الثديات؟

ExampleWords.AUni: gallop, trot, hop, crawl, fly, soar

Question.AUni: (2) How do cows move?
(2) يف تتحرك الأبقار؟

ExampleWords.AUni: walk, trot, wander, lie down, charge

Question.AUni: (3) How do dogs move?
(3) يف تتحرك الكلاب؟

ExampleWords.AUni: trot, run, wag its tail

Question.AUni: (4) How do horses move?
(4) يف تتحرك الأحصنة؟

ExampleWords.AUni: run, gallop, trot, canter, buck, kick, race, charge

Question.AUni: (5) How do lions move?
(5) يف تتحرك الأسود؟

ExampleWords.AUni: walk, stalk, charge, run down, prowl

Question.AUni: (6) How do whales move?
(6) يف تتحرك الحيتان؟

ExampleWords.AUni: breach

Question.AUni: (7) How do birds move?
(7) يف تتحرك الطيور؟

ExampleWords.AUni: fly, flutter, soar, dive, swoop, bank, turn, (hummingbird) hover, hop, roost, hang in the air, ride the wind, alight, land

Question.AUni: (8) How do snakes move?
(8) يف تتحرك الثعابين؟

ExampleWords.AUni: slither, glide

Question.AUni: (9) How do fish move?
(9) يف تتحرك الأسماك؟

ExampleWords.AUni: swim, leap

Question.AUni: (10) How do insects move?
(10) يف تتحرك الحشرات؟

ExampleWords.AUni: fly, hover, dive-bomb, crawl

Question.AUni: (11) How do worms move?
(11) يف تتحرك الديدان؟

ExampleWords.AUni: crawl, inch along, creep

Question.AUni: (12) What words refer to the annual migration of animals?
(12) ما هي الكلمات التي تدل على الهجرة السنوية للحيوانات؟

ExampleWords.AUni: migrate, migration, fly south

Question.AUni: (13) What words refer to animals moving in a group?
(13) ما هي الكلمات التي تدل على حركة الحيوانات وسط مجموعة؟

ExampleWords.AUni: herd (v), flock (v), swarm (v), herd instinct, fly in formation, move as a herd,

Question.AUni: (14) What words refer to animal tracks?
(14) ما هي الكلمات التي تدل على آثار الحيوانات؟

ExampleWords.AUni: track,

AStr.Run: Use this domain for words referring to animals eating. Because animals often eat in very different ways from people, many languages will have words that are specific to the way an animal eats.

Question.AUni: (1) How do mammals eat?
(1) يف تَأكل الثديات؟

ExampleWords.AUni: graze, feed, chew the cud

Question.AUni: (2) How do carnivores eat?
(2) يف تَأكل الحيوانات اللاحمة؟

ExampleWords.AUni: devour, gorge, tear (prey)

Question.AUni: (3) How do birds eat?
(3) يف تَأكل الطيور؟

ExampleWords.AUni: peck,

Question.AUni: (4) How do snakes eat?
(4) يف تأكُل الثعابين

ExampleWords.AUni: swallow

Question.AUni: (5) How do insects eat?
(5) يف تَأكل الثعابين؟

ExampleWords.AUni: suck blood, bloodsucking, chew (holes in leaves)

AStr.Run: Use this domain for the sounds animals make. It is necessary to think through the sounds each type of animal makes, especially the important ones.

(2) ما هي الأصوات التي تصدرها الأبقار؟

(3) ما هي الأصوات التي تصدرها الأحصنة؟

(4) ما هي الأصوات التي تحدثها الخرفان؟

(5) ما هي الأصوات التي تحدثها الخنازير؟

ExampleWords.AUni: grunt, snort, squeal,

(6) ما هي الأصوات التي تحدثها الكلاب؟

ExampleWords.AUni: bark, bay, howl, yap, growl, snap, snarl, whimper, whine, woof woof, yelp, yowl,

(7) ما هي الأصوات التي تحدثها القطط؟

(8) ما هي الأصوات التي تحدثها الأسود؟

(9) ما هي الأصوات التي تحدثها الفئران؟

(10) ما هي الأصوات التي تحدثها الطيور؟

ExampleWords.AUni: sing, song, cry, call, birdcall, birdsong, caw (crow), chatter, cheep, chirp, coo (dove), gaggle, gobble (turkey), honk (goose), hoot (owl), peep, quack (duck), screech, squawk, trill, trumpet, tweet, twitter, warble, whir, whistle,

(11) ما هي الأصوات التي يحدثها الدجاج؟

(12) ما هي الأصوات التي تحدثها الثعابين؟

ExampleWords.AUni: hiss, rattle

(13) ما هي الأصوات التي تحدثها الضفادع؟

ExampleWords.AUni: croak, rivet

Question.AUni: (14) What sounds do crocodiles make?
(14) ما هي الأصوات التي تحدثها التماسيح؟

ExampleWords.AUni: roar

Question.AUni: (15) What sounds do fish make?
(15) ما هي الأصوات التي تحدثها الحيتان؟

(16) ما هي الأصوات التي تحدثها الحشرات؟

AStr.Run: Use this domain for animal homes. It is necessary to think through the homes of each type of animal, especially the important ones.

Question.AUni: (1) What general words refer to where an animal lives?
(1) ما هي الكلمات العامة التي تدل على المكان الذي تعيش فيه الحيوانات؟

Question.AUni: (2) Where do mammals live?
(2) ين تعيش الثديات؟

ExampleWords.AUni: den, hole, burrow, molehill

(3) ما هي الأماكن الأخرى التي تستعملها الثديات؟

ExampleWords.AUni: wallow, hunting grounds, watering hole, pasture, range, trail

Question.AUni: (4) Where do birds live?
(4) ين تعيش الطيور؟

ExampleWords.AUni: nest, birds nest, perch, range

Question.AUni: (5) Where do snakes live?
(5) ين تعيش الثعابين؟

ExampleWords.AUni: snake pit, den of vipers, snake hole

Question.AUni: (7) Where do insects live?
(7) ين تعيش الحشرات؟

ExampleWords.AUni: anthill, ants nest, termite mound, termite hill, hive, beehive, bee's wax, honeycomb, spider web, cocoon, trail (of ants)

Question.AUni: (8) Where do spiders live?
(8) ين تعيش العناكب؟

ExampleWords.AUni: spider web, cobweb

Question.AUni: (9) Where do worms live?
(9) ين تعيش الديدان؟

ExampleWords.AUni: wormhole

AStr.Run: Use this domain for words referring to groups of animals.

(1) ما هي الكلمات التي تدل على مجموعة من الثديات؟

Question.AUni: (2) What words refer to a group of birds?
(2) ما هي الكلمات التي تدل على مجموعة من الطيور؟

ExampleWords.AUni: flock (of birds), bevy, colony, covey, flight, flock, gaggle

Question.AUni: (3) What words refer to a group of fish?
(3) ما هي الكلمات التي تدل على مجموعة من الأسماك؟

ExampleWords.AUni: school (of fish), shoal

Question.AUni: (4) What is a group of insects called?
(4) ماذا نسمي مجموعة من الحشرات؟

ExampleWords.AUni: swarm (of insects), plague of locusts

Question.AUni: (5) What is a group of small animals called?
(5) ماذا نسمي مجموعة من الحيوانات الصغيرة؟

ExampleWords.AUni: culture

(6) ما هي الكلمات التي تدل على قائد مجموعة من الحيوانات؟

Question.AUni: (7) What words refer to the followers in a group of animals?
(7) ما هي الكلمات التي تدل على الأتباع في وسط مجموعة من الحيوانات؟

ExampleWords.AUni: harem

Question.AUni: (8) What words refer to a group of baby animals?
(8) ما هي الكلمات التي تدل على مجموعة من الحيوانات حديثي الولادة؟

Question.AUni: (9) What other words relate to groups of animals?

AStr.Run: Use this domain for words referring to male and female animals. Most languages have special words for the male and female of a species only for domesticated animals. Sometimes there will be a word for the male and not the female, and vice versa (male dog, bitch). Sometimes the word for one is also used generically (cow for both female and generic).

Question.AUni: (1) What words refer to a male or female animal?
(1) ما هي الكلمات التي تدل على حيوان ذكر أو حيوان أنثى؟

ExampleWords.AUni: male, female, bitch, tom, tomcat, bull, bullock, cow, heifer, ram, ewe, billy goat, nanny goat, boar, sow, stallion, mare, filly, stag, buck, hart, doe, vixen, lioness, tigress, bull elephant, rooster, cock, hen, drake, peacock, peahen

AStr.Run: Use this domain for general words for the whole human body, and general words for any part of the body. Use a drawing or photo to label each part. Some words may be more general than others are and include some of the other words. For instance 'head' is more general than 'face' or 'nose'. Be sure that both general and specific parts are labeled.

AStr.Run: Use this domain for words related to the female reproductive organs and a woman's monthly menstrual cycle. Some of these terms may be taboo. Care must be exercised in which terms are included in the dictionary. A group of women should decide which terms are 'public' and can go in the dictionary, and which would be considered taboo, overly crude, or embarrassing. For example some societies have been afraid that their women will be taken advantage of if these terms are known.

AStr.Run: Use this domain for general words related to all the senses--sight, hearing, smell, taste, and feeling. Some languages may not distinguish some of these senses, and some languages may have words for other senses. There are also other senses that animals have. If your language has words for other senses, include them here.

ExampleWords.AUni: emphasize, stress

Question.AUni: (2) What words refer to the importance placed on something?
(2) ما هي الكلمات التي تعني الأهمية التي أعطيت لشيء ما؟

ExampleWords.AUni: emphasis, stress, importance

AStr.Run: The <emphasis> is on efficiency.

Question.AUni: (3) What words describe something that is emphasized?
(3) ما هي الكلمات التي تصف شيء وقع التركيز عليه؟

ExampleWords.AUni: important, stand out, be conspicuous, be prominent

AStr.Run: Use this domain for words that express the idea that something (said, written, thought, or made) depicts or is about a subject, or that something is logically related to some topic. Also use this domain for words that mark the topic or subject of what is being thought about, talked about, or written about. Verbs of thinking, knowing, or speaking (including other types of expression) can take a 'topic' role. We can think of a 'topic' as the main idea. Use this domain also for the important thing in a picture.

Question.AUni: (1) What words refer to being about something or someone?
(1) ما هي الكلمات التي تعني أن يكون الشيء أو الشخص شأنه متعلق بشيء أو شخص ما؟

ExampleWords.AUni: be about something, concern, deal with, be concerned with, center on, focus on, address, cover, depict, discuss, dwell on, present, portray, treat,

AStr.Run: The book <is about> the President.; The meeting <is about> the schedule.; The story <depicts> the life of the President.; The story <presents> a view of the President.

Question.AUni: (2) What words indicate what something is about?
(2) ما هي الكلمات التي تعني ماهيّة شيء ما؟

ExampleWords.AUni: about, on, concerning, on the subject of, regarding, re, with regard to, in, of,

AStr.Run: John was talking <about> the new seed he bought.; I read <about> John in the newspaper.; a book <about> the President; the book <on> the President; the picture <of> the President; an experiment <concerning> growing rice; a course <in> history

Question.AUni: (3) What words refer to the thing something is about?
(3) ما هي الكلمات التي تعني ما يعنيه شيء ما؟

ExampleWords.AUni: subject, topic, theme, issue, question, matter, business, thing,

AStr.Run: The <subject> of the book is the President.; The <topic> of the discussion is efficiency.
Use this domain for words that indicate if something is true, if it agrees with reality, or if it is not true.

ExampleWords.AUni: untrue, false, falsehood, wrong, error, inaccurate, incorrect, mistake

AStr.Run: Use this domain for obscene words related to sex, defecation, death, damnation, and other taboo or offensive subjects. It is important to check the appropriateness of including obscene words in the dictionary. It should be the choice of the speakers of the language whether a word should be included or excluded. Obscene words included in the dictionary should be clearly marked as such. Obscenity is often used to heighten the emotion of an expression, and is often used when someone is angry. Obscenity is often associated with sex or defecation. Cursing is often associated with God, religion, or the afterlife. Insults often involve equating a person with an animal that is associated with an undesirable characteristic, questioning someone's parentage/legitimacy, questioning someone's character, or questioning someone's intelligence/sanity.

Question.AUni: (1) What words refer to breaking a contract?

Name.AUni: عدالة ما هي الكلمات التي تعني العدالة؟

AStr.Run: Use this domain for words related to justice.

Question.AUni: (1) What words refer to justice?

ExampleWords.AUni: justice, fairness

AStr.Run: Use this domain for words related to being impartial.

Question.AUni: (1) What words describe a person who treats other people equally?
(1) ما هي الكلمات التي تعني شخصا يعامل الناس الآخرين بشكل عادل؟

ExampleWords.AUni: be impartial, fair, consistent, equal treatment, impartial, impartiality,

AStr.Run: Use this domain for words related to being unfair.

Question.AUni: (1) What words refer to whether someone deserves something?
(1) ما هي الكلمات التي تعني إن كان شخص يستحقّ شيئا ما؟

ExampleWords.AUni: unfair, unjust, wrongful,

Question.AUni: (2) What words describe something that someone does not deserve?
(2) ما هي الكلمات التي تصف شيئا لا يستحقّه شخص؟

ExampleWords.AUni: undeserved, inappropriate, unwarranted, unearned,

AStr.Run: Use this domain for words related to deserving something--if you do something, either good or bad, something can happen to you as a result of what you did. For instance you can receive a reward for doing good, or a punishment for doing wrong. If what happened to you is like what you did, people can think it is right that this thing happened to you.

Question.AUni: (1) What words refer to deserving what you receive?
(1) ما هي الكلمات التي تعني أن تستحق ما تتحصّل عليه؟

ExampleWords.AUni: deserve, merit, be owed, be yours by right, have earned,

Question.AUni: (2) What words indicate that someone deserves the problems they are having?
(2) ما هي الكلمات التي تعني أنّ شخصا يستحق المشاكل التي تحصل له؟

ExampleWords.AUni: deserve, had it coming, get what you deserve, serve someone right, get your just deserts, get what was coming to you, your punishment fits the crime,

Question.AUni: (3) What words describe something that someone deserves?
(3) ما هي الكلمات التي تصف شيئا يستحقه شخص ما؟

ExampleWords.AUni: well-deserved, well-earned, fitting, appropriate,

AStr.Run: Use this domain for words related to being unfair to someone.

Question.AUni: (1) What words refer to being unfair to someone?
(1) ما هي الكلمات التي تعني أن يكون الشخص غير عادل تجاه شخص ما؟

ExampleWords.AUni: discriminate, be unfair, biased, prejudiced

Question.AUni: (2) What words refer to the act or practice of being unfair?
(2) ما هي الكلمات التي تعني فعل أو ممارسة الظلم؟

ExampleWords.AUni: unfairness, discrimination, bias, prejudice

Question.AUni: (3) What words refer to one person causing another to be unfair?
(3) ما هي الكلمات التي تعني شخصا يتسبب في جعل شخص آخر غير عادل؟

ExampleWords.AUni: bias someone against, prejudice someone against

AStr.Run: Use this domain for words related to acting harshly.

(1) ما هي الكلمات التي تعني التصرّف بخشونة؟

AStr.Run: Use this domain for words related to oppressing someone or a particular group of people--when a person uses his power or authority to harm others who are innocent.

Question.AUni: (1) What words refer to oppressing someone?
(1) ما هي الكلمات التي تعني اضطهاد شخص؟

ExampleWords.AUni: oppress, bully, harass, hound, persecute, repress, tyrannize,

Question.AUni: (2) What words refer to the act or practice of oppressing people?
(2) ما هي الكلمات التي تعني فعل أو ممارسة اضطهاد الناس؟

ExampleWords.AUni: oppression, harassment, persecution, tyranny

Question.AUni: (3) What words refer to a person who oppresses?
(3) ما هي الكلمات التي تعني شخصا يَضطهد؟

ExampleWords.AUni: oppressor, persecutor, bully, slave driver, tyrant, dictator

Question.AUni: (4) What words describe a person who is oppressed?
(4) ما هي الكلمات التي تصف شخصا مُضطهدا؟

ExampleWords.AUni: oppressed, persecuted, tyrannized

Question.AUni: (5) What words describe a person who oppresses?
(5) ما هي الكلمات التي تصف شخصا يَضطهد؟

ExampleWords.AUni: oppressive, tyrannical, cruel

AStr.Run: Use this domain for general words referring to conflict between people, including quarreling, fighting, and war. The words in this domain should be very general, rather than referring to specific kinds of conflict.

Question.AUni: (1) What general words refer to conflict between people?
(1) ما هي الكلمات العامة التي تعني الصراع بين الناس؟

ExampleWords.AUni: conflict, strife,

AStr.Run: The words in this domain describe a situation in which people disagree about something so strongly that they might start fighting. But these words imply that they have not started fighting yet.

Question.AUni: (1) What words refer to hostility between people?
(1) ما هي الكلمات التي تعني عِداء بين أشخاص؟

ExampleWords.AUni: conflict, antagonism, discord, disharmony, friction, hostility, ill feeling, rivalry, strife, tension, sit on a powder key, cold war, phony war,

Question.AUni: (2) What words describe someone who is hostile?
(2) ما هي الكلمات التي تصف شخصا عدائيا؟

ExampleWords.AUni: hostile, aggressive, combative, contentious, discordant,

AStr.Run: Use this domain for words referring to opposing something that you think is wrong.

Question.AUni: (1) What words refer to opposing something?
(1) ما هي الكلمات التي تعني أن تُعارض شيئا؟

ExampleWords.AUni: oppose, be opposed to, be against, anti-

Question.AUni: (2) What words refer to something someone does to show he is opposed to something?
(2) ما هي الكلمات التي تعني شيئا يفعله شخص ليُظهر أنه معرض لشيء ما؟

ExampleWords.AUni: objection, opposition, hostility, antagonism,

Question.AUni: (3) What words refer to saying that you are opposed to something?
(3) ما هي الكلمات التي تعني القول بأنك معارض لشيء ما؟

ExampleWords.AUni: object to, voice opposition to, express opposition to, raise objections,

Question.AUni: (4) What words refer to someone who opposes something?
(4) ما هي الكلمات التي تعني شخصا يُعارض شيئا ما؟

ExampleWords.AUni: opponent, the opposition, enemy, foe,

Question.AUni: (5) What words describe someone who opposes something?
(5) ما هي الكلمات التي تصف شخصا يُعارض شيئا؟

ExampleWords.AUni: opposing, hostile, antagonistic, opposing,

AStr.Run: Use this domain for words referring to fighting someone. The words in this domain describe a situation in which two people or groups of people fight each other over something or in order to reach some goal. A fight can use words, various kinds of weapons, or other actions. For fights that only use words use the domain 'Quarrel'.

Question.AUni: (1) What words refer to enemies fighting?
(1) ما هي الكلمات التي تعني صراع الأعداء؟

ExampleWords.AUni: fight, have a fight, get into a fight, fighting, battle, brawl, bully, clash, come to blows, confront, duel, engage (the enemy), face (an enemy), feud, jostle, joust, oppose, scuffle, set-to, spar, skirmish, squabble, strive, struggle, tussle, war, wrestle, be in the fray, go on the warpath,

Question.AUni: (2) What words refer to a fight?
(2) ما هي الكلمات التي تعني معركة؟

ExampleWords.AUni: affray, altercation, battle (n), bout, combat, conflict, contest, crisis, duel (n), feud (n), gunfight, row, shootout, showdown, skirmish, spat, squabble, strife, struggle (n), tiff, war (n),

Question.AUni: (3) What words refer to a fight between a few people?
(3) ما هي الكلمات التي تعني معركة بين البعض من الناس؟

ExampleWords.AUni: fight (n), brawl (n), fracas, fray, free-for-all, melee, scrap, scuffle (n),

Question.AUni: (4) What words refer to a fight between many people?
(4) ما هي الكلمات التي تعني صراعا بين العديد من الناس؟

ExampleWords.AUni: fighting, battle, clash (n), confrontation,

Question.AUni: (5) What words refer to a fight that neither side can win?
(5) ما هي الكلمات التي تعني صراعا لا يمكن لأحد الطرفين فيه أن ينتصر؟

ExampleWords.AUni: stalemate, standoff,

Question.AUni: (6) What words refer to someone causing a fight?
(6) ما هي الكلمات التي تُشير إلى شخص ما يتسبّب في معركة؟

ExampleWords.AUni: arouse, challenge, embroil, fan the flames, goad, incite, instigate, provoke, rally, rouse, spur, stir up,

Question.AUni: (7) What words refer to someone who is fighting?
(7) ما هي الكلمات التي تشير إلى شخص ما يُحارب؟

ExampleWords.AUni: fighter, hooligan,

AStr.Run: Use this domain for words referring to fighting for something good.

(1) ما هي الكلمات التي تعني الصراع من أجل هدف حسن؟

ExampleWords.AUni: fight for, work for, campaign, champion, be a champion of,

Question.AUni: (2) What words refer to the process of fighting for something good?

ExampleWords.AUni: fight (n) for, struggle for, battle, campaign for, crusade for, drive

AStr.Run: Use this domain for words referring to fighting against something bad.

ExampleWords.AUni: fight, fight against, put up a fight, combat, wage war on, campaign, launch a campaign,

Question.AUni: (2) What words refer to fighting against someone who is trying to do something bad?

Question.AUni: (3) What words refer to the process of fighting against something bad?

ExampleWords.AUni: fight (n) against, struggle against, battle against, campaign against, crusade against,

AStr.Run: Use this domain for words referring to attacking someone--to begin fighting someone.

ExampleWords.AUni: attack (n), assault, charge (n), onrush, rush (n), strike (n),

Question.AUni: (5) What words refer to an attack in war?
(5) ما هي الكلمات التي تعني هجوما في حرب؟

ExampleWords.AUni: attack (n), assault (n), foray, invasion, incursion, strike (n), push, raid (n), offense, offensive, onset, onslaught, aggression, ambush (n), sally, siege, sortie, penetration,

Question.AUni: (6) What words refer to a person or group that attacks?

ExampleWords.AUni: attacker, attacking force, aggressor, assailant, invader, invasion force,

Question.AUni: (7) What words refer to the person or place that is attacked?

ExampleWords.AUni: victim, target, be under attack

Question.AUni: (8) What words describe a person or place that is easy to attack?

(9) ما هي الكلمات التي تعني بدأ الصراع؟

Question.AUni: (10) What words describe an attack that was not caused by an earlier action?

AStr.Run: Use this domain for words related to revenge--to do something bad to someone because they did something bad to you.

(4) ما هي الكلمات التي تعني أن يكون الشخص مسالما؟

ExampleWords.AUni: become peaceful, pacify, pacification

Question.AUni: (5) What words refer to keeping the peace?
(5) ما هي الكلمات التي تعني البقاء في سلام؟

ExampleWords.AUni: keep the peace, peacekeeping force

(4) ما هي الكلمات التي تعني الاعتراف بالخطأ؟

(1) ما هي الكلمات التي تعني طلب العفو؟

(2) ما هي الكلمات التي تعني إنهاء الحرب مع أعدائك؟

AStr.Run: Use this domain for general words referring to religion and the supernatural.

ExampleWords.AUni: religion, religious system, faith

(2) ما هي الكلمات التي تعني الشيء الذي يتجاوز أحاسيسنا و قدراتنا؟

ExampleWords.AUni: supernatural, magic, miracle, miraculous, paranormal

(3) ما هي الكلمات التي تصف شيئا له علاقة بالدّين؟

ExampleWords.AUni: religious, sacred, spiritual

Question.AUni: (4) What words refer to those areas of life outside of religion?
(4) ما هي الكلمات التي تعني أرجاء الحياة خارج الدين؟

ExampleWords.AUni: secular, profane

(5) ما هي الكلمات التي تعني عالم الآلهة و الأرواح؟

ExampleWords.AUni: spirit world, spiritual realm, the supernatural, the unseen

AStr.Run: Use this domain for words related to God--the supreme being in the universe. Each theological system will have different beliefs concerning the existence and nature of God. Our purpose here is to collect and define the terms used to refer to the supreme deity. If there is no such person in the theological system, then use this domain for other terms for the pantheon of gods, ultimate reality, nirvana, and similar concepts. However most theological systems, even atheism, have the concept of a supreme God and use words to refer to him.

Question.AUni: (1) What words refer to the supreme being in the universe?
(1) ما هي الكلمات التي تعني الكائن الأسمى في الكون؟

ExampleWords.AUni: God, the Lord, Yahweh, Elohim, Allah, Theos, Deus, Sky God, supreme being, supreme deity

Question.AUni: (2) What words refer to what people believe about God?
(2) ما هي الكلمات التي تعني ما يُؤمن به الناس بشأن الله؟

ExampleWords.AUni: theology, monotheism, polytheism, pantheism, atheism

Question.AUni: (3) What words describe something to do with God?
(3) ما هي الكلمات التي تصف شيئا له علاقة بالله؟

ExampleWords.AUni: divine,

AStr.Run: Use this domain for words referring to supernatural beings--gods, spirits, other types of beings, which normally cannot be seen and do not belong to this world. Some people accept the existence of certain supernatural beings and not others. Mythological beings are those that were believed in during previous times but that are no longer believed in. Fictional beings are those that no one has ever believed in. An indication of whether most people believe in the supernatural being should be put in the definition.

Question.AUni: (1) What general words refer to supernatural beings?
(1) ما هي الكلمات العامة التي تعني كائنا يفوق الطبيعة؟

ExampleWords.AUni: supernatural being, spirit

Question.AUni: (2) What words refer to lesser gods?
(2) ما هي الكلمات التي تعني آلهة في رتبة ثانية من الألوهية؟

ExampleWords.AUni: god, goddess, the gods, pantheon, deity,

Question.AUni: (3) What types of good supernatural beings are there?
(3) ما هي أنواع الكائنات الحسنة التي تفوق الطبيعة؟

ExampleWords.AUni: angel, angelic being, cherub, seraph, saint

Question.AUni: (4) What types of evil supernatural beings are there?
(4) ما هي أنواع الكائنات الشريرة التي تفوق الطبيعة؟

ExampleWords.AUni: demon, devil, Satan, the Devil, Beelzebub

Question.AUni: (5) What words refer to the spirit of a dead person?
(5) ما هي الكلمات التي تعني روح شخص مايت؟

ExampleWords.AUni: spirit, ghost, specter, apparition, phantom, shade, ghoul

Question.AUni: (6) What words refer to supernatural beings that are considered to be mythological or fictional and not real?
(6) ما هي الكلمات التي تعني الكائنات التي تفوق الطبيعة و التي تُعتر ميتافيزيقية أو خيالية أو غير حقيقية؟

ExampleWords.AUni: Santa Claus, elf, fairy, giant, dwarf, sprite, genie, dragon, monster, Cyclops, vampire, alien

Question.AUni: (7) What words describe something like or related to a supernatural being?
(7) ما هي الكلمات التي تصف شيئا يُشبه أو يرتبط بكائن يفوق الطبيعة؟

ExampleWords.AUni: divine, angelic, demonic, Satanic, devilish, diabolical, ghost like, ghoulish, monstrous, alien,

AStr.Run: Use this domain for words related to theology--the study of God and what people believe about God.

(1) ما هي الكلمات التي تعني دراسة الله و الدين؟

ExampleWords.AUni: theology,

(2) ما هي الكلمات التي تعني أشياء بشأن الله تُؤمن بها؟

ExampleWords.AUni: doctrine, tenet, dogma, belief,

ExampleWords.AUni: heterodoxy, sect, denomination, dissent

ExampleWords.AUni: superstition

AStr.Run: Use this domain for words related to sacred writings. Examples are only given for the Christian sacred writings. However you should include words referring to the holy books of all religions .

(1) ما هي الكلمات التي تعنسي كتابات مقدّسة؟

ExampleWords.AUni: sacred writings, Scripture, Bible, the Good Book, Gospel

(2) ما هي الكلمات التي تعني جزءا من الكتابات المقدسة؟

(3) ما هي الكلمات التي تعني دور الله في خلق كتابات مقدّسة؟

ExampleWords.AUni: inspire, inspiration, revelation

Question.AUni: (4) What words describe the sacred writings or a text from the sacred writings?
(4) ما هي الكلمات التي تصف كتابات مقدّسة أو نصّا من الكتابات المقدسة؟

ExampleWords.AUni: inspired, holy, scriptural, biblical, sacred, prophetic, apostolic

Question.AUni: (5) What words describe whether or not a book should be considered a part of the sacred writings?
(5) ما هي الكلمات التي تصف إمكانية اعتبار كتاب ما كجزء من الكتابات المقدّسة؟

ExampleWords.AUni: canon, canonical, apocryphal

Question.AUni: (6) What words refer to a book that is revered but not considered part of the sacred writings?
(6) ما هي الكلمات التي تعني كتابا يُوقّر و لكنه لا يُعتبر جزءا من الكتابات المقدّسة؟

ExampleWords.AUni: Apocrypha

Question.AUni: (7) What words refer to the interpretation of sacred writings?
(7) ما هي الكلمات التي تعني تأويل كتابات مقدّسة؟

ExampleWords.AUni: interpretation, exegesis

Question.AUni: (8) What words refer to a book that interprets the sacred writings?
(8) ما هي الكلمات التي تعني كتابا يُؤوّل الكتابات المقدّسة؟

ExampleWords.AUni: commentary

AStr.Run: Use this domain for words related to miracles--the use of supernatural power to do something good.

(1) ما هي الكلمات التي تعني قوّة تفوق الطبيعة؟

(2) ما هي الكلمات التي تعني القيام بمعجزة ؟

(4) ما هي الكلمات التي تصف معجزة؟

(5) ما هي الكلمات التي تعني شخصا يمكنه القيام بمعجزة؟

AStr.Run: Use this domain for words related to sorcery--the use of supernatural power to do something bad.

ExampleWords.AUni: spell, curse, hex, enchantment, charm, incantation,

(5) ما هي الكلمات التي تصف شخصا أو شيئا يمكنه أن يقوم بالسحر؟

ExampleWords.AUni: have magical powers, magic (adj), magical, supernatural, occult, mystic, weird,

(6) ما هي الكلمات التي تصف شخصا قد سُحر؟

ExampleWords.AUni: charmed, bewitched, spellbound, haunted,

(7) ما هي الكلمات التي تعني حماية شخص من الشعوذة؟

ExampleWords.AUni: ward off,

(8) ما هي الأشياء التي تُستعمل لممارسة السحر؟

ExampleWords.AUni: charm, amulet, evil eye, talisman, fetish, wand, rod, divining rod, magic ring, philosopher's stone, magic carpet, cauldron,

Question.AUni: (9) What words are used when performing sorcery?
(9) ما هي الكلمات التي تُستعمل عند مُمارسة السحر؟

ExampleWords.AUni: abracadabra, open sesame,

(10) ما هي الكلمات التي تعني قوّة مؤذية تفوق الطبيعة؟

AStr.Run: Use this domain for words referring to demon possession--when a demon or spirit influences or controls the behavior of a person. Use this domain for all words related to the relationship between spirits and people, including communication between people and spirits. Also use this domain for words referring to casting out demons--causing a demon to stop influencing or controlling a person.

Question.AUni: (1) What words refer to being influenced or controlled by a demon?
(1) ما هي الكلمات التي تعني أن يكون الشخص متأثرا أو تحت سيطرة روح شرّيرة؟

ExampleWords.AUni: be possessed, be demonized, go into a trance,

Question.AUni: (2) What words refer to what demons do to people?
(2) ما هي الكلمات التي تعني الأشياء التي تقوم بها الأرواح الشرّيرة للناس؟

ExampleWords.AUni: possess, inhabit, demonize, torture, haunt, trouble

Question.AUni: (3) What words refer to casting out a demon?
(3) ما هي الكلمات التي تعني طرد الشياطين؟

ExampleWords.AUni: cast out a demon, exorcise, drive out, expel, deliver/free/release from demonic power/influence

Question.AUni: (4) What words refer to a person who casts out demons?

ExampleWords.AUni: exorcist

AStr.Run: Use this domain for words related to blessing someone--saying something that causes something good to happen, or requests God to do something good to someone.

ExampleWords.AUni: bless, pronounce a blessing, give a blessing, bestow a blessing, invoke,

Question.AUni: (2) What words refer to what is said in blessing?
(2) ما هي الكلمات التي تعني الشيء الذي يُقال للمُباركة؟

ExampleWords.AUni: blessing, benediction,

AStr.Run: Use this domain for words related to cursing someone.

(1) ما هي الكلمات التي تعني لَعن شخص؟

ExampleWords.AUni: curse, put/place a curse on, be under a curse, be cursed

Question.AUni: (2) What words refer to the curse place on someone?
(2) ما هي الكلمات التي تعني اللعنة التي تكون موضوعة على شخص ما؟

ExampleWords.AUni: curse, anathema,

AStr.Run: Use this domain for words related to destiny--decisions and actions by God, spirits, or by impersonal forces that determine or influence what happens to a person.

Question.AUni: (2) What words refer to an impersonal force that determines what happens to a person?
(2) ما هي الكلمات التي تعني قوّة غير بشرية المصدر تُحدّد ما سيحصل لشخص؟

ExampleWords.AUni: destiny, fate, fortune, luck, chance, throw of the dice

Question.AUni: (3) What words refer to something to which a person or thing is destined?
(3) ما هي الكلمات التي تعني شيئا مُعَدٌّ لمستقبل شخص أو شيء؟

AStr.Run: Use this domain for words referring to speaking for God, including foretelling the future through divine knowledge.

(3) ماذا نسمي شخصا يتكلم باسم الله و يتكهن بالمستقبل؟

ExampleWords.AUni: prophet, prophetess

(4) ما هي الكلمات التي تصف شيئا ما قيل في نبوءة؟

AStr.Run: Use this domain for words related to supernatural knowledge.

(1) ما هي الكلمات التي تعني معرفة تفوق الطبيعة؟

Question.AUni: (2) What words refer to being able to divine secrets?
(2) ما هي الكلمات التي تعني أن يكون الشخص قادرا على التنبؤ بأسرار؟

ExampleWords.AUni: divine, read the signs, foretell the future

Question.AUni: (3) What words refer to the practice of divining secrets?
(3) ما هي الكلمات التي تعني ممارسة التنبؤ بالأسرار؟

ExampleWords.AUni: divination, palmistry, fortune telling, astrology

Question.AUni: (4) What is a person called who can divine secrets?
(4) ماذا نسمي شخصا يُمكنه التكهن بالأسرار؟

ExampleWords.AUni: diviner, fortuneteller, astrologer

Question.AUni: (5) What words describe someone who can divine secrets?
(5) ما هي الكلمات التي تصف شخصا يُمكنه التكهن بالأسرار؟

ExampleWords.AUni: clairvoyant,

Question.AUni: (6) What words refer to something showing what will happen in the future?
(6) ما هي الكلمات التي تعني شيئا يُظهِرُ ما الذي سيحدث في المستقبل؟

ExampleWords.AUni: augur, betoken, bode, forebode, foreshadow, foretell, foretoken, ominous, portend, prefigure, presage,

Question.AUni: (7) What words refer to something that shows or tells a secret?
(7) ما هي الكلمات التي تعني شيئا يُظهر أو يُبرز سرّا؟

ExampleWords.AUni: omen, sign, harbinger, portent, presage, foreshadowing, message from the beyond

Question.AUni: (8) What methods are used to divine secrets?
(8) ما هي الوسائل التي تُستعمل لتّكهن بالأسرار؟

ExampleWords.AUni: interpret dreams, read palms, read tea leaves, read cards, read the stars, consult your horoscope, look into a crystal ball, play with a Ouija board, examine the entrails of an animal

AStr.Run: Use this domain for words related to practicing religion.

Question.AUni: (1) What words refer to practicing religion?
(1) ما هي الكلمات التي تعني ممارسة الدين؟

ExampleWords.AUni: practice your religion, serve God

AStr.Run: Use this domain for words related to being devout.

Question.AUni: (1) What words describe someone who practices his religion with devotion?
(1) ما هي الكلمات التي تعني شخصا يُمارس دينه بتقوى؟

Question.AUni: (2) What words describe someone who is not devout?
(2) ما هي الكلمات التي تصف شخصا ليس تقيا؟

ExampleWords.AUni: uncommitted, nominal, lukewarm

AStr.Run: Use this domain for words related to praying--talking to God.

Question.AUni: (1) What words refer to praying to God?
(1) ما هي الكلمات التي تعني الصلاة للّه؟

ExampleWords.AUni: pray, talk to God, beseech

Question.AUni: (2) What words refer to prayer?
(2) ما هي الكلمات التي تعني الصلاة؟

ExampleWords.AUni: prayer, supplication, intercession, petition, thanksgiving, grace, benediction

Question.AUni: (3) What actions or postures symbolize prayer?
(3) ما هي الحركات أو وضعيات الجسد التي تُمثل الصلاة؟

ExampleWords.AUni: bow your head, kneel, fold your hands

AStr.Run: Use this domain for personal expressions of devotion to God, in whatever ways the religion defines and expresses it.

Question.AUni: (1) What words refer to relating to God or to the spirits?
(1) ما هي الكلمات التي تعني التواصل مع الله أو مع الأرواح؟
(2) What words refer to acts of worship toward God?
(2) ما هي الكلمات التي تعني أعمال عبادة تجاه الله؟

ExampleWords.AUni: worship, adore, revere, reverence, lift up your heart, pay homage

Question.AUni: (3) What words refer to the act of worship?
(3) ما هي الكلمات التي تعني فعل العبادة؟

ExampleWords.AUni: worship, adoration, devotion, homage, service, reverence, veneration, deification, idolization

Question.AUni: (4) What actions or postures symbolize worship?
(4) ما هي الأعمال أو الحركات الجسدية التي ترمز إلى العبادة؟

ExampleWords.AUni: bow, kneel, genuflect, prostrate oneself

Question.AUni: (5) What types of actions make up worship?
(5) ما هي أنواع الحركات التي تصنع العبادة؟

ExampleWords.AUni: prayer, singing hymns, praising God

AStr.Run: Use this domain for words related to religious ceremonies.

(1) ما هي الكلمات التي تعني انجاز مراسم دينية؟

ExampleWords.AUni: perform a religious ceremony, hold communion

(2) ما هي الكلمات التي تعني مراسم دينية؟

ExampleWords.AUni: religious ceremony, worship service, church service, time of prayer, prayer meeting, Bible study, liturgy, invocation

AStr.Run: Use this domain for words related to offering a sacrifice.

(1) ما هي الكلمات التي تعني تقديم قربان؟

ExampleWords.AUni: sacrifice, offer a sacrifice, offer up, burn on the altar, devote, consecrate

Question.AUni: (2) What words refer to offering a sacrifice?
(2) ما هي الكلمات التي تعني تقديم قربان؟

ExampleWords.AUni: sacrifice, offering, devotion, consecration

Question.AUni: (3) What words refer to what is sacrificed?
(3) ما هي الكلمات التي تعني الشيء الذي يقع تقديمه كقربان؟

ExampleWords.AUni: sacrifice, offering, burnt offering, votive offering, gift

Question.AUni: (4) What words describe a sacrifice?
(4) ما هي الكلمات التي تصف قربانا؟

ExampleWords.AUni: sacrificial (giving, lamb), devoted, consecrated

AStr.Run: Use this domain for words related to religious purification.

(2) ما هي الكلمات التي تصف شيئا قد وقع تطهيره؟

Question.AUni: (3) What words describe something that has not been purified?
(3) ما هي الكلمات التي تصف شيئا لم يقع تطهيره؟

ExampleWords.AUni: be impure, defiled, polluted, unwashed

Question.AUni: (4) What words refer to something that causes impurity?
(4) ما هي الكلمات التي تعني شيئا يُسبب عدم الطهارة؟

ExampleWords.AUni: impurity, defilement, pollution

AStr.Run: Use this domain for words referring to things that are taboo--something to be avoided; a religious, social, or cultural restriction on behavior, as opposed to a government law.

Question.AUni: (1) What words refer to a cultural restriction on behavior?
(1) ما هي الكلمات التي تعني قيود ثقافية على التصرفات؟

ExampleWords.AUni: taboo, prohibition

Question.AUni: (2) What words refer to making something taboo?
(2) ما هي الكلمات التي تعني جعل شيء ما محظورا؟

ExampleWords.AUni: make taboo, forbid, prohibit, ban

Question.AUni: (3) What words describe something that is taboo?
(3) ما هي الكلمات التي تعني تصف شيئا محظورا؟

ExampleWords.AUni: taboo, forbidden, prohibited, untouchable, inviolable, banned, off-limits, avoided

AStr.Run: Use this domain for the primary goal or goals of a religion, for instance in Christianity salvation from sin, death and Hell. Each religion has different beliefs about salvation. Our purpose here is not to preach or argue, but to list those words that people use to talk about this topic.

Question.AUni: (1) What words refer to what God does to save a person?
(1) ما هي الكلمات التي تعني الشيء الذي يقوم بالله من أجل إنقاذ شخص؟

ExampleWords.AUni: save, salvation, sanctify, redeem, justify, regenerate

Question.AUni: (2) What words refer to a person who saves another?
(2) ما هي الكلمات التي تعني شخصا يُنقذ شخصا آخر؟

ExampleWords.AUni: savior

Question.AUni: (3) What words refer to what a person does to be saved?
(3) ما هي الكلمات التي تعني الشيء الذي يقوم به شخص من أجل أن يُنقذ؟

ExampleWords.AUni: believe, repent, return (to God), receive, work, earn

Name.AUni: يُكرّس شيئا من أجل الاستعمال الديني

AStr.Run: Use this domain for words related to dedicating someone or something to religious use.

Question.AUni: (1) What words refer to dedicating something to religious use?
(1) ما هي الكلمات التي تعني تكريس شيء من أجل الاستعمال الديني؟

ExampleWords.AUni: dedicate, consecrate, anoint, sanctify, devote, hallow, baptize, circumcise

Question.AUni: (2) What words describe something that has been dedicated?
(2) ما هي الكلمات التي تعني شيئا قد وقع تكريسه؟

ExampleWords.AUni: holy, consecrated, sanctified, sacred, devoted, baptized

Question.AUni: (3) What words describe something that has not been dedicated?
(3) ما هي الكلمات التي تصف شيئا لم يقع تكريسه؟

ExampleWords.AUni: unholy, common

Question.AUni: (4) What words refer to improperly using something that has been dedicated?
(4) ما هي الكلمات التي تعني استعمال غير مناسب لشيء قد وقع تكريسه؟

ExampleWords.AUni: desecrate

AStr.Run: Use this domain for words related to fasting--to not eat for a period of time.

Question.AUni: (1) What words refer to not eating for a period of time?
(1) ما هي الكلمات التي تعني عدم تناول الطعام لفترة زمنية؟

ExampleWords.AUni: fast, deny (oneself)

Question.AUni: (2) What words refer to a person who denies himself for religious purposes?
(2) ما هي الكلمات التي تعني شخصا يحرم نفسه من أجل أهداف دينية؟

ExampleWords.AUni: ascetic

Question.AUni: (3) What words refer to the general practice of denying oneself something?
(3) ما هي الكلمات التي تعني الممارسة العامة لحرمان النفس من شيء ؟

ExampleWords.AUni: asceticism

Question.AUni: (4) What words refer to a time when a person fasts or denies himself in some other way?
(4) ما هي الكلمات التي تعني وقتا يصوم فيه شخص أو يحرم نفسه فيه بطريقة أخرى؟

AStr.Run: Use this domain for words related to heaven and hell--the place where people go after they die.

Question.AUni: (1) What is the place or home of God called?
(1) ماذا نسمي مكان أو بيت الله؟

ExampleWords.AUni: Heaven, the highest heaven, the abode of God, the throne of God

(2) ماذا نسمي المكان الذي يعيش فيه الناس الموتى؟

ExampleWords.AUni: Hades, Sheol, the place of the dead, the grave, the other side, the beyond, underworld, nether world,

(3) ماذا نسمي المكان الذي يذهب إليه المؤمنون(الناس الصالحون) عندما يموتون؟

ExampleWords.AUni: heaven, paradise, your reward

Question.AUni: (4) What is the place called where unbelievers (bad people) go when they die?
(4) ماذا نسمي المكان الذي يذهب إليه غير المؤمنون(الأشخاص السيئون) عندما يموتون؟

ExampleWords.AUni: hell, the pit, fire and brimstone, eternal damnation

Question.AUni: (5) What words refer to going to heaven or hell?
(5) ما هي الكلمات التي تعني الذهاب إلى الجنة أو إلى جهنم؟

ExampleWords.AUni: pass on, go to heaven, go to hell

Question.AUni: (6) What words describe something belonging to heaven or hell?
(6) ما هي الكلمات التي تصف شيئا ينتمي إلى الجنة أو النار؟

ExampleWords.AUni: celestial, heavenly, hellish

AStr.Run: Use this domain for words related to resurrection--life after death, or living again after dying.

ExampleWords.AUni: come back to life, come back from the grave, come to life, resurrection

Question.AUni: (2) What words refer to causing someone to come back to life?
(2) ما هي الكلمات التي تعني جعل شخص يعود إلى الحياة؟

ExampleWords.AUni: resurrect, raise from the dead, bring back to life, bring back from the dead

Question.AUni: (3) What words refer to the condition or state of living forever?
(3) ما هي الكلمات التي تعني حالة العيش إلى الأبد؟

ExampleWords.AUni: live forever, (have) eternal life, life everlasting, immortality, life after death,

Question.AUni: (4) What words refer to reincarnation?
(4) ما هي الكلمات التي تعني التجسد الجديد في جسد كائن آخر بعد الموت؟

ExampleWords.AUni: reincarnation, reincarnated,

AStr.Run: Use this domain for words referring to official religions, groups within a religion, and religious meetings. Each religion will have different names for its groups. Answer each question for each religion.

Question.AUni: (1) What general words refer to an official religion?
(1) ما هي الكلمات التي تعني ديانة رسمية؟

ExampleWords.AUni: religion, faith

Question.AUni: (2) What are the names of the official religions?
(2) ما هي الكلمات التي تعني أسماء الديانات الرسمية؟

ExampleWords.AUni: Christianity, Islam, Hinduism, Judaism, animism, paganism,
